svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - June 29 2024

title: "Week in Ethereum News
June 29, 2024" date: "2024-06-29"
Eth News and Links
SEC charges Consensys, US Supreme Court overrules Chevron deference and Reth (Paradigmâ€™s Rust
execution layer client) is production ready
All core devs
â€¢ All core devs â€“ consensus (ACDC) #136 : Presentation on private sharing of client info by validators
research PÃ©ter SzilÃ¡gyi: proposal to cross validate with other execution layer clients statelessly
(before Verkle) and change engine API encoding from JSON to SSZ Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade :
pectra-devnet-1 : waiting on execution layer clients EIP6110 validator deposits onchain : proposal to
rate limit deposit processing EIP7594 PeerDAS : peerdas-devnet-1 launched with 3 consensus layer
clients, discussion on decoupling layers for blob count EIP7688 SSZ StableContainer : devnet running
but not all clients have implemented, no decision yet on including in Electra
â€¢ Presentation on private sharing of client info by validators research
Presentation on private sharing of client info by validators research
â€¢ PÃ©ter SzilÃ¡gyi: proposal to cross validate with other execution layer clients statelessly (before
Verkle) and change engine API encoding from JSON to SSZ
PÃ©ter SzilÃ¡gyi: proposal to cross validate with other execution layer clients statelessly (before
â€¢ Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade : pectra-devnet-1 : waiting on execution layer clients EIP6110
validator deposits onchain : proposal to rate limit deposit processing EIP7594 PeerDAS :
peerdas-devnet-1 launched with 3 consensus layer clients, discussion on decoupling layers for blob
count EIP7688 SSZ StableContainer : devnet running but not all clients have implemented, no decision
yet on including in Electra
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade :
â€¢ pectra-devnet-1 : waiting on execution layer clients
pectra-devnet-1 : waiting on execution layer clients
â€¢ EIP6110 validator deposits onchain : proposal to rate limit deposit processing
EIP6110 validator deposits onchain : proposal to rate limit deposit processing
â€¢ EIP7594 PeerDAS : peerdas-devnet-1 launched with 3 consensus layer clients, discussion on decoupling
layers for blob count
EIP7594 PeerDAS : peerdas-devnet-1 launched with 3 consensus layer clients, discussion on decoupling
â€¢ EIP7688 SSZ StableContainer : devnet running but not all clients have implemented, no decision yet
on including in Electra
EIP7688 SSZ StableContainer : devnet running but not all clients have implemented, no decision yet on
including in Electra
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade, likely targeting Q1 2025
â€¢ Future of EOA/AA breakout #5 : EIP7702 delegation designation proposal to be merged next week
Future of EOA/AA breakout #5 : EIP7702 delegation designation proposal to be merged next week
â€¢ PeerDAS breakout #2 : passing max blobs per block is preferred solution for decoupling layers, value
should be configurable and fetching from execution layer pool experiment
PeerDAS breakout #2 : passing max blobs per block is preferred solution for decoupling layers, value
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
â€¢ ðŸš¨ Lido at 29.2% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 29.2% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
â€¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~55% majority Lighthouse client
info in graffiti (7.4% of blocks): Geth 62% Consensus layer: Prysm 38% Any client bug over 33.3% could
mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
â€¢ Execution layer: Geth ~55% majority
Execution layer: Geth ~55% majority
â€¢ Lighthouse client info in graffiti (7.4% of blocks): Geth 62%
Lighthouse client info in graffiti (7.4% of blocks): Geth 62%
â€¢ Consensus layer: Prysm 38%
Consensus layer: Prysm 38%
â€¢ Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
â€¢ Geographic distribution of validators , estimated using p2p data
Geographic distribution of validators , estimated using p2p data
Layer 1
â€¢ Gossipsub performance , recommends reducing concurrent IWANT messages sent & lowering heartbeat
frequency
Gossipsub performance , recommends reducing concurrent IWANT messages sent & lowering heartbeat
â€¢ EF Protocol Security Research team explainer of what they do
EF Protocol Security Research team explainer of what they do
Research
â€¢ Orbit SSF : solo-staking-friendly validator set management for single slot finality
Orbit SSF : solo-staking-friendly validator set management for single slot finality
â€¢ Execution Auctions superior to Execution Tickets , simpler to implement but have centralization
concerns (which may be curbed by Inclusion Lists)
Execution Auctions superior to Execution Tickets , simpler to implement but have centralization
Client Releases
â€¢ Consensus layer: Lighthouse v5.2.1 : small fixes for sync & backfill Nimbus v24.6.0 : SHA256 hashing
30% faster, avoid slashing when validator key sharing improperly configured, adds block scoring and
enables block monitoring by default
Consensus layer:
â€¢ Lighthouse v5.2.1 : small fixes for sync & backfill
Lighthouse v5.2.1 : small fixes for sync & backfill
â€¢ Nimbus v24.6.0 : SHA256 hashing 30% faster, avoid slashing when validator key sharing improperly
configured, adds block scoring and enables block monitoring by default
Nimbus v24.6.0 : SHA256 hashing 30% faster, avoid slashing when validator key sharing improperly
â€¢ Execution layer: Erigon v2.60.2 : fixes Reth (Paradigm) v1 : production ready ; sync from genesis in
~50 hours, 2.3TB archive node
Execution layer:
â€¢ Erigon v2.60.2 : fixes
Erigon v2.60.2 : fixes
â€¢ Reth (Paradigm) v1 : production ready ; sync from genesis in ~50 hours, 2.3TB archive node
Reth (Paradigm) v1 : production ready ; sync from genesis in ~50 hours, 2.3TB archive node
Layer 2
â€¢ Arbitrum Timeboost proposed, auction for express transaction submission (non-express transactions
have a short delay), proceeds will either be in ARB (burnt) or ETH (collected)
Arbitrum Timeboost proposed, auction for express transaction submission (non-express transactions have
a short delay), proceeds will either be in ARB (burnt) or ETH (collected)
â€¢ Flashbots: MEV on L2s
Flashbots: MEV on L2s
â€¢ Offchain Labs BlobWatcher : monitor transaction pool for blob transactions
Offchain Labs BlobWatcher : monitor transaction pool for blob transactions
â€¢ Blast phase 1 airdrop, goes in at $2B FDV
Blast phase 1 airdrop, goes in at $2B FDV
â€¢ L2Beat ZK Catalog : code verification of onchain ZK verifiers
L2Beat ZK Catalog : code verification of onchain ZK verifiers
For Stakers
â€¢ Stakesaurus: DVT home staking guide (Diva), aimed at novices
Stakesaurus: DVT home staking guide (Diva), aimed at novices
â€¢ Ethereum on ARM : full node (Geth + Nimbus) on Rock 5B 16 GB RAM with 2 physical cores
Ethereum on ARM : full node (Geth + Nimbus) on Rock 5B 16 GB RAM with 2 physical cores
EIPs/Standards
â€¢ EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals): EIP7727 : EVM transaction bundles
EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals):
â€¢ EIP7727 : EVM transaction bundles
â€¢ RIPs (Rollup improvement proposals): RIP7728 : Precompile for L1SLOAD
RIPs (Rollup improvement proposals):
â€¢ RIP7728 : Precompile for L1SLOAD
â€¢ ERCs (application layer standards): ERC7729 : Token with metadata (ERC20 extension) ERC7730 :
Structured data clear signing format
ERCs (application layer standards):
â€¢ ERC7729 : Token with metadata (ERC20 extension)
ERC7729 : Token with metadata (ERC20 extension)
â€¢ ERC7730 : Structured data clear signing format
ERC7730 : Structured data clear signing format
Stuff for developers
â€¢ Snekmate v0.1 (Vyper contracts): contracts made module friendly, targets Vyper v0.4.0
Snekmate v0.1 (Vyper contracts): contracts made module friendly, targets Vyper v0.4.0
â€¢ Remix v0.51 : adds SolidityScan to analyze code for vulnerabilities and supports EIP712
eth_signTypedData in Remix VM
Remix v0.51 : adds SolidityScan to analyze code for vulnerabilities and supports EIP712
â€¢ Patrick Collins: guide to where EVM can read/write data
Patrick Collins: guide to where EVM can read/write data
â€¢ Gas playground : browser playground for Solidity contracts, uses live state (currently Base only)
Gas playground : browser playground for Solidity contracts, uses live state (currently Base only)
â€¢ Guide to mine an efficient address using create2crunch
Guide to mine an efficient address using create2crunch
â€¢ EVMole v0.3.5 (function selector extractor): adds Vyper support
EVMole v0.3.5 (function selector extractor): adds Vyper support
â€¢ Viem experimental adds Solady ERC1271 Actions
Viem experimental adds Solady ERC1271 Actions
â€¢ Paradigm fellowship technical questions
Paradigm fellowship technical questions
â€¢ RareSkills Uniswap v2 puzzles
RareSkills Uniswap v2 puzzles
â€¢ Cyfrin updraft : updated Solidity & Foundry courses
Cyfrin updraft : updated Solidity & Foundry courses
Ecosystem
â€¢ EF Next Billion cohort 4 fellows
EF Next Billion cohort 4 fellows
â€¢ ETHKyiv hackathon projects
ETHKyiv hackathon projects
Enterprise
â€¢ Stripe adding Base support to their crypto payouts & onramp
Job Listings
â€¢ Gnosis is hiring: Discord Moderator
Gnosis is hiring: Discord Moderator
â€¢ IMC: Quant Developer for DeFi and MEV focused team
IMC: Quant Developer for DeFi and MEV focused team
â€¢ Privacy and Scaling Explorations: ZK Circuits Engineer
Privacy and Scaling Explorations: ZK Circuits Engineer
â€¢ Nethermind: Preconfirmations Senior Engineer , Protocol Researcher , Senior Content Marketing &
Senior Marketing Manager
Nethermind: Preconfirmations Senior Engineer , Protocol Researcher , Senior Content Marketing &
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
â€¢ Fees (via ultrasound.money ): Gas: 1.2 to 31.4 gwei, 4.5 gwei average; zero net issuance at 23.5
gwei 13k ETH net issuance this week
Fees (via ultrasound.money ):
â€¢ Gas: 1.2 to 31.4 gwei, 4.5 gwei average; zero net issuance at 23.5 gwei
Gas: 1.2 to 31.4 gwei, 4.5 gwei average; zero net issuance at 23.5 gwei
â€¢ 13k ETH net issuance this week
13k ETH net issuance this week
â€¢ ETHUSD : $3,259 - $3,516, currently $3,385, all time high $4,878
ETHUSD : $3,259 - $3,516, currently $3,385, all time high $4,878
â€¢ ETHBTC : currently 0.056 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.056 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Regulation/business/tokens
â€¢ SEC charges Consensys as an unregistered broker for MetaMask Swaps and claims MetaMask Staking sells
securities (stETH & rETH)
SEC charges Consensys as an unregistered broker for MetaMask Swaps and claims MetaMask Staking sells
â€¢ US Supreme Court: holds SEC violated right to trial by jury; no more SEC kangaroo courts overrules
Chevron , courts no longer must defer to federal agency power grabs
US Supreme Court:
â€¢ holds SEC violated right to trial by jury; no more SEC kangaroo courts
holds SEC violated right to trial by jury; no more SEC kangaroo courts
â€¢ overrules Chevron , courts no longer must defer to federal agency power grabs
overrules Chevron , courts no longer must defer to federal agency power grabs
â€¢ Coinbase filed FOIA lawsuits against SEC & FDIC over Bidenâ€™s Operation Chokepoint 2.0
Coinbase filed FOIA lawsuits against SEC & FDIC over Bidenâ€™s Operation Chokepoint 2.0
â€¢ US Treasury finalized broker rule , but punts on DeFi
US Treasury finalized broker rule , but punts on DeFi
General
â€¢ Iranians vote : scan passport NFC to prove eligibility, generate ZK proof & vote on Gnosis chain
Iranians vote : scan passport NFC to prove eligibility, generate ZK proof & vote on Gnosis chain
â€¢ Polyfill (JavaScript) supply chain attack, Cloudflare automatically replacing links
Polyfill (JavaScript) supply chain attack, Cloudflare automatically replacing links
â€¢ Wired: home invader convicted of burglarizing & torture to steal crypto
Wired: home invader convicted of burglarizing & torture to steal crypto
END OF SERVICE: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News
Editor: @abcoathup Follow @WeekinEthNews for the most clicked links Permalink:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-june-29-2024
